name: 2D Shooter (GhostCyder)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project. Customized the game for a smoother experience.

Modifications:

  1. New UI(new font,outlines, etc.)
  2. Set of 3 levels with increased difficulty(still very casual)
  3. Minor changes to fit the new levels, for example, edited projectiles(speed, size, color, time between shots)

Credits:

Created by Francisco Silveira
